UCODE

UCode is based on Scratch programming and supports both software and hardware programming. Users can program by dragging blocks instead of using keyboards. UCode can not only create interesting games and animated works, but also program the hardware products of UBTECH.

The software is used in conjunction with uKit building blocks hardware, sensors, steering gear and mainboard control. UAPP CREATOR (DEMO VERSION)

uAPP Creator is a visual Android application development platform. Users do not need to have basic knowledge of Java, coding, and memory of various programming commands. They can complete the development and production of Android applications only by dragging and pulling the building blocks.[/et_pb_text][dipl_button inline_buttons=”on” buttons_alignment=”left” inline_buttons_tablet=”” inline_buttons_phone=”on” inline_buttons_last_edited=”on|phone” buttons_alignment_tablet=”center” buttons_alignment_phone=”” buttons_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” button_font=”||||||||” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_font_size=”20px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” button_font_size_tablet=”” button_font_size_phone=”16px” button_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_radii=”on|12px|12px|12px|12px”][dipl_button_item button_text=”Windows” button_bg_color=”#007FE0″ button_alignment=”center” button_custom_margin=”||||false|false” button_custom_padding=”6px|26px|6px|26px|true|true” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center”][/dipl_button_item][/dipl_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|30px||30px|true|true”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: DOWNLOAD EDUCATION CONNECTS THE FUTUREUCODE UCode is based on Scratch programming and supports both software and hardware programming. Users can program by dragging blocks instead of using keyboards. UCode can not only create interesting games and animated works, but also program the hardware products of UBTECH.
